text: Nomuri ico gitabu c’Imana ca Taurati, twarabandikiye yuko umuntu yicwa k’uwundi, n’ijisho kurindi, n’izuru kurindi, n’ugutwi kukundi, n’iryinyo kurindi, uko niko kurihisha ingere kuyindi mugihe abantu bakomerekanye, mugabo uwuzogirira uwundi imbabazi azoba yitangiye indishi kuriwe, n’abadategeka kuvyo Imana yamanuye, abo nibo bahemukiye imitima yabo
